description: Takes one optional hand slot as a parameter (0 or 'main_hand' for main hand, 1 or 'off_hand' for off hand), and returns 1.0 if the item is charged in the requested slot (defaulting to the main hand if no parameter is supplied), otherwise returns 0.0. Applies generally to the crossbow.

generated_doNotEdit.title: Item Is Charged
generated_doNotEdit.description: Takes one optional hand slot as a parameter (0 or 'main_hand' for main hand, 1 or 'off_hand' for off hand), and returns 1.0 if the item is charged in the requested slot (defaulting to the main hand if no parameter is supplied), otherwise returns 0.0.
